| HistoryText             = [[Neena Thurman (Earth-616)|Domino]] had been on many different teams including [[X-Force (Earth-616) |X-Force]], the [[X-Men (Earth-616) |X-Men]], and [[Six Pack (Earth-616)|Six Pack]], but she eventually decided to start her own mercenary group full of people she liked. Her first recruit was [[Rachel Leighton (Earth-616)|Diamondback]], which meant they had stealth and impact covered, but still lacked muscle.<!-- {{r|Domino Annual Vol 1 1}} -->

Meanwhile, Domino and Diamondback were hired to retrieve [[Sentinels]] tech which had been stolen by [[Professor Salvage (Earth-616)|Professor Salvage]] who had hired [[Inez Temple (Earth-616)|Outlaw]] to be his bodyguard. When they entered the local saloon, they found Outlaw, who had just won a big bar fight, and when Domino and Diamondback saw this, they decided it would be a good idea to add her to their team. The meeting between them did not start very well and resulted in a fight, but despite this rough start, they finally got her to listen to them. Shortly after explaining to Outlaw that Professor Salvage was anti-mutant, he decided to attack the saloon with a murder sport utility vehicle. It was then that Outlaw joined the posse and went on to battle against Professor Salvage with them.{{r|Domino Annual Vol 1 1}}
